content.description:
PSYCHE AND SUBSTANCE - 5.9** 50' F(6b)

On the lower face below Uninhabited Man, begin at the pile of boulders and climb up and right to the chain anchors over the top.

POOH CORNER - 5.10a *** 75' M(1b)

The obvious clean corner on the left side of narrow face to the right blank "Love at First Sight" face. Excellent climbing after the awkward bush traverse down low. Top half is the hard part. (All three of these fine trad lines share the same start and chain top anchors)
content.protection: mixed, 1 bolt and a full range of cams

content.description:
LOVE AT FIRST SIGHT 5.12+??? 70' TR

Climb the middle of the smooth wall on the right with the band along the bottom. Sustained and very thin. 2 chain anchors on top.
content.location: The shorter blank smooth face right of the main wall

content.description:
JUNG AND RESTLESS 5.10a ** 70' G

The intermittent cracks in the middle of the face. Wonderful fingerlocks and thin feet and a double rack of small to medium cams and nuts needed to protect.

climbs.name: The Hedgehog, the Mousetrap and the Squid

content.description:
The Hedgehog, the Mousetrap and the Squid - 5.10/A0 ** (90') M (9b)

Like three routes in one... Begin at the vertical crack on the right side of the main face. Climb this to the dark band (5.7 trad). Step left at the top of the crack (avoiding the bushes) and once above the dark band traverse left a few feet and follow the line of bolts to the pair of chain anchors on top. This is a diverse and challenging route with a wonderful trad crack, then a bolted face with a blank middle section that requires pulling on a couple of bolts to keep it 5.10. Cruxy both below and above the "bolt ladder".
content.protection: Mixed - 9 bolts, plus an assortment of small nuts and cams until above the dark band.
content.location: At the right side of the main face.

content.description:
THE GREAT PANJANDRUM 5.8 ** 95' M(3b)

Start at the right edge of the main face just right of the crack, and climb the shallow ramp to the broken edge on the right. Continue up through the black band to the excellent crack above (classic). Climb the short corner behind the small pine and head left onto the face when possible to the belay ledge with the 2 chain anchors on top. This is a fun and adventurous, mostly gear protected climb, with an excellent middle section and top.
content.protection: Mixed, 3 bolts plus a wide range of nuts or cams.
content.location: The right side of the main (west) face.

climbs.name: Where Ego, Ergo, I Go Too

content.description:
WHERE EGO ERGO I GO TOO 5.7** 55' F (6b)

Begin 5' right of the pile of boulders and climb directly up. There is a directional bolt below the lip at the top. Shares anchors with Psyche and Substance

UNINHABITED MAN 5.7 ** 70' G

Start as for Poor Corner and climb the hand to off-width crack on the right. Better and harder than it looks. Full range of cams and nuts needed to protect. Shares top chains with other 2 routes.

TO AIR IS HUMAN 5.12+??? 65' TR

Climbs the clean arête on the right. Sustained and difficult.
content.location: The arete right of the smooth face

content.description:
SUBSTANCE ABUSE 5.6 * 60' F (5b)

Begin about 10' left of the boulder pile (start of Psyche and Substance) with a bouldery start and climb up the bulges and slabs to the directional bolt below the lip. Shares chain anchors with Psyche and Substance.

SHADOW PUPPET 5.9 * 60' F(4b)

Begin 10' right of the rock pile (just left of the mini roof) and climb up the face to the directional bolt below the lip. Shares chain anchors with the other routes.
